pkgmetadata.longdescription: DSA buddy client @Copyright 2021-22 [Botoservices]Steps:1. Please Check your Python version. Python3 is required for this package2. Install it using below command: pip install dsa-buddy3. You can submit your code using below decorator. [Check below Sample code]4. When you will run your code, it will ask you to enter dsa-buddy credentials. [Note: You must be registered with dsa-buddy Telegram bot]5. If you have any query regrading registeration or want to share any feedback, Please contact us via "botoservices@gmail.com" Sample Code:```#################### Sample code #####################import dsa_buddy@dsa_buddy.submit()def factorial(num):ans = 1 while num > 0: ans = ans * num num = num - 1 return ansfactorial(5)######################################################```
